title: Episode #27 - The Lives of Viking and Mongolian Women
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
Please take our listener survey, we'd love to hear your feedback and how you think we could improve the show! https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/JQVH895?fbclid=IwAR1XURKStu4Xj7f-Juy9kUtfDAHnRBKOSsn6LmMbjrtrneJrkhRpeS07y9Y

This time Emma and Janina take a look at the lives of women in the very martial Norse and Mongolian cultures. How were their lives different from those of their contemporaries in other cultures?

Featuring:
A very novel use for a sack of silver!
The grave matter of burial goods!
Political powerhouses!

Sources: https://historyissexy.com/show-notes/episode-27-viking-mongolian-women
